name: ONTRAPORT to Wishlist Integration
author: ITMOOTI

sections.description: Each Membership Level in Wishlist relates to two tags that you will create manually in ONTRAPORT. Then you will create some Rules that are triggered by adding or removing these particular tags. The Rules ping a URL and send contact info to the Wishlist Site to Update or Create the new user and giving them the correct access based on their tags in ONTRAPORT.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ontraport-wishlist-plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload ontraport-wishlist-plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Learn More In Our Knowledge Base

ITMOOTI Knowledge Base for Ontraport Apps/Integrations and Plugins

How do I get a License Key?

Please visit this URL http://app.itmooti.com/wp-plugins/ontraport-wishlist-integration/license/ to get a License Key .

Does it work for Office Autopilot and Ontraport?

This plugin works for ONTRAPORT 3.0

How long is the Free Trial?

The free trial is for 7 days. After that you can buy a HERE to get a License Key .

Where can I get support?

Send us an email to support@itmooti.com or visit our Support Page HERE

short_description: This plugin helps you create new members in your Wishlist Membership site based on ONTRAPORT contacts and tags. It is the easiest way to Automate your …

Then you will create some Rules that are triggered by adding or removing these particular tags.
